function.name: lightingMode-setValue
function.description: This function is used to change the lighting mode of a SmartThings device.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to set the lighting mode.

predefinedLightingMode.description: The specific lighting mode to be set (e.g., writing mode, night mode, sleep mode).

mode.description: The mode to be set (used interchangeably with predefinedLightingMode).
